item.title: Mamdani is elected mayor of New York. Here are his next hurdles.
item.description: The 34-year-old built a diverse coalition including young and disaffected voters, but his lack of governing experience could be a challenge.

item.title: New York, city of immigrants, scores another first — a Muslim mayor
item.description: His opponents seized on Islamophobic attacks in the final weeks of the campaign. But Muslim Americans say his perseverance has given them newfound hop...

item.title: A Muslim mayor, a female governor and other notable election ‘firsts’
item.description: The first Muslim woman to hold statewide office in the U.S. and Detroit’s first female mayor join Zohran Mamdani and Abigail Spanberger in trailblazin...

item.title: Winners and losers from the 2025 election
item.description: It was not a good night for Trump or Republicans aligned with him.

item.title: After strong election, Democrats now face battle over who defines party
item.description: The GOP is eager to name Mamdani the leader of the Democratic Party. Many Democrats say Spanberger and Sherrill are more representative.
